contains(IndexedOrderedSetLib.IndexedOrd.details: Returns boolean if the key is in the set

get(IndexedOrderedSetLib.IndexedOrderedS.details: Retrieves the element at the provided index.

indexOf(IndexedOrderedSetLib.IndexedOrde.details: Returns the index of the value in the set.

params.value: The value to look up the index for.

pop(IndexedOrderedSetLib.IndexedOrderedS.details: Removes the element at index idx from the set and returns it.

remove(IndexedOrderedSetLib.IndexedOrder.details: Removes the element at index idx from the set

params.value: The value to remove from the set.

size(IndexedOrderedSetLib.IndexedOrdered.details: Returns the size of the set
